title.rendered: What are NFTs and what are they for: advantages and disadvantages

content.rendered:
Surely you have already heard about NFTs, since more and more we have seen how artists, graphic designers, influencers and even many companies in the popular field related to sports and video games have been creating NFTs; and to this day more creators and companies continue to join, but Do you know what they are and how they work?

The meaning of NFT stands for Non Fungible Touch or Touch Non-Fungiblewhich refers to a digital file unique protected by a token (electronic signature). In a nutshell is a digital certificate that gives authenticity to a digital file which can be: gif, video, album, illustration, photograph, movie, song, image, etc.

Due to its exclusivity and 100% digital DNA, NFTs store the creations of artists, engineers, musicians, etc. with the possibility of selling or reselling, granting exclusivity to the buyer, they are also insured, this gives you the certainty that whatever you have bought belongs only to you.

They are used to represent virtually any type of tangible or intangible item, including: artwork, music, collectibles, virtual items within video games, such as skins, virtual currencies, weapons and avatars. In a few words, it is a technology that is used as a way of doing business.

Properties acquired as NFTs have certain characteristics yes or yes you should know in case you soon decide to sell or buy in this way: Exclusivenessan NFT can only have one owner at a time, this good can be resold, but the original creator will receive part of the profit each time it is resold; DiversityNFTs are a promising bet for everything digital and this allows the market to expand, in a short time art will cease to be the king of NFTs, we already saw the case of the sale of the first tweet in history with NFTs.

Also, have the advantage of decentralization, since the interaction between buyer and seller is direct, which eliminates extra expenses; and finally, Security, the items purchased through NFTs are safe since at the time of selling them a cryptographic token is generatedIt’s unique that they provide an extra layer of security and ensure that every asset is tracked and verified.

Yes, anyone can enter this virtual world, an example of this is Triller, an AI-powered platform for creators, they have a section called: Triller NFTs in which it is possible to find a catalogamong its articles are rare photographs of Basquiat.

If you want to live this experience we recommend you to explore Thriller NFTs, a secure platform with which you can access the world of NFTs. Remember that if you want to sell, you will need to use graphic content tools, or turn to a specialist. Consider that what you are going to sell is a striking and original product.

So now you know, there is no better school than life, go through and explore the world of NFTs raw, now that you know the basics you will know how to use it, maybe you are a collector or a creator who has just discovered a new way to sell your art.

AANH
